metadata.title: CVE-2015-1819 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The xmlreader in libxml allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption) via crafted XML data, related to an XML EntityExpansion (XEE) attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5
libxml2-utils - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5
python-libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.5').
